org.fosstrak.reader.rprm.core.msg
Class SenderHandshakeMessage

java.lang.Object
  org.fosstrak.reader.rprm.core.msg.SenderHandshakeMessage
Direct Known Subclasses:
HttpSenderHandshakeMessage, TcpSenderHandshakeMessage
public abstract class SenderHandshakeMessage
extends java.lang.Object

Class used for handshaking. The handshake parameters are internally handled as String. Thus it's evident to validate the values to have correct lengths and contents using the method isValid().

Author:
Andreas Fürer, ETH Zurich Switzerland, Winter 2005/06
